Name: Glow Skin Cream
Short description: A revitalizing mist toner with colloidal silver, vitamins, and botanicals that instantly hydrates, soothes, and restores glow. Ideal for daily refreshment and skin renewal.
Description:
ilver Tonic – Mist Lotion – 100ml – Colloidal Silver Tonic
A refreshing mist lotion enriched with colloidal silver, skin-renewing vitamins, and soothing botanical extracts to instantly hydrate, revitalize, and brighten the complexion. Ideal for all skin types, this ultra-fine tonic can be used any time of the day to restore glow, moisture, and freshness. It also supports skin elasticity, improves tone, and strengthens the skin barrier.

 Key Benefits:

  • Instantly refreshes and hydrates the skin

  • Revitalizes dull, tired complexions

  • Supports collagen production and skin elasticity

  • Soothes, tones, and protects against environmental stress

  • Helps reduce the appearance of pores and blemishes

 Active Ingredients:

  • Colloidal Silver: Hydrating and anti-aging, it enhances elasticity and skin radiance.

  • Vitamin B5 (Pantothenic Acid): Moisturizes, soothes, and repairs the skin.

  • Vitamin B6 (Pyridoxine): Promotes collagen production and regulates sebum.

  • Niacinamide (Vitamin PP): Refines pores, strengthens the skin barrier, and evens skin tone.

  • Sodium PCA: Maintains hydration and the skin’s natural pH.

  • Lactates (Sodium & Ammonium): Gently exfoliate and replenish moisture.

  • Aloe Extract: Calms, hydrates, and reduces blemishes.

  • Eyebright Extract: Antioxidant-rich and hydrating; supports anti-aging and skin barrier protection.

  • Borage Extract: Regenerates dry skin and soothes inflammatory skin conditions.

  • St. John’s Wort Extract: Brightens and purifies sun-damaged or impure skin.

  • Cornflower Extract: Calms, decongests, and protects the skin.

 How to Use:
Spray evenly on the face from about 30cm away, keeping eyes closed. Gently pat until absorbed. Shake before use.

 Warnings:
For external use only. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

 Ingredients:
Aqua, Propylene Glycol, Ammonium Lactate, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Lactate, Phenoxyethanol, Imidazolidinyl Urea, Niacinamide, Calcium Pantothenate, Pyridoxine, Chlorphenesin, Sodium PCA, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Parfum, Borago Officinalis Extract, Centaurea Cyanus Flower Extract, Euphrasia Officinalis Extract, Hypericum Perforatum Flower/Leaf Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Extract, Buteth-3, Hexamethyl Indanopyran, Vanillin, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Colloidal Silver, Benzyl Salicylate, Sodium Hydroxide, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Tributyl Citrate.
